body:
Hi Adam, 
Thanks for your suggestion. 
I changed the develop to master in the script. 
In addition, I forgot to change the hompage to the new one. So, I submitted a new pull request here.
Please ignore the previous request and approve this one. Thanks.
FYI, I changed the archive to download version in spack package only from this version number (2.1.10). All the previous versions' checksums are unchanged.

Best,
Sheng
title: release SZ 2.1.10
